remarks:
The product of two positive reals is positive.  Axiom 21 of 22 for real and complex numbers, derived from ZF set theory.  (This restates ~ ax-pre-mulgt0 with ordering on the extended reals.)  (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.)

 The product of two positive reals is positive.  Axiom for real and complex numbers, derived from set theory.  (This restates ~ ax-pre-mulgt0 with ordering on the extended reals.)  (Contributed by NM, 13-Oct-2005.)
